name: Pizza Fries
description: Craving the flavours of pizza while still satisfying your hankering for fries? Look no further! Dive into a plate of these perfectly seasoned fries that pay homage to pizza, without all the heavy toppings.
preparation: Wedge or cut potatoes into 16–20 wedges.
Place in a bowl with seasoning and oil, tossing to coat.
Arrange in a single layer on a crisper. Bake for 15–20 minutes.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 protein serving and 1⁄2 cup veggies.
